metadata.name: Life is a battlefield
metadata.description:
I have no choice but to fight!
When fate draws bloody plans for you from the day of your birth, You will be condemned to an eternal war that begins with death and ends with death...
I have no choice but to fight in this bloody ocean.
Our life is tied to the storm...
We are the objectification of the word "Captivity";
In captivity of stormy waves,
Our perspective is "blindness",
Our voice is muffled in "being dumb"
And our hope is only in God who has been dead for many years...
We are from the people and we will return to the people.
We have no choice but to fight;
Because the ocean will swallow us sooner or later...



#IranRevolution2022
(Created by midjourney AI engine)
